SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName mwFixesLoadSettings

Begin Function { }

	; Enable/Disable all Strict Morrowind Settings
	if (mwFixes.StrictMWAll == 1)
		set mwFixes.StrictMWWaterBreathing to 1
		set mwFixes.StrictMWSpells to 1
		set mwFixes.StrictMWRunSpeed to 1
		set mwFixes.StrictMWFatigueDrain to 1
		set mwFixes.StrictMWEncumbranceSlowing to 1
		set mwFixes.StrictMWEnchantmentSelection to 1
		set mwFixes.EnableRaceRestrictions to 1
	endif

	; Set up run/walk/fatigue speeds
	Call mwSetWalkRunFatigue

End
